title: Phase 0.5.2: CI/CD Pipeline - Internal Skill Factory
description:
GOAL: Build automated pipeline from Gemini → Validation → Staging → Production.

PARENT: claude-code-plugins-fwu (EPIC: 500 Skills)

LOCATION: workspace/gemini-testing/

PIPELINE STAGES:
1. GENERATION: Gemini API → raw/ (25 SKILL.md files)
2. VALIDATION: scripts/validate-skills-schema.py → validated/ or failed/
3. AUTO-FIX: scripts/auto-fix-yaml.js → fixed/ (retry validation)
4. QUALITY: scripts/validate-skill-quality.py → quality-report.json
5. STAGING: Human spot-check (10% sample) → staging/
6. DEPLOYMENT: scripts/deploy-skills.js → /skills/production/

DIRECTORY STRUCTURE:
workspace/gemini-testing/output/
├── batch-001/
│   ├── raw/           # Gemini output
│   ├── validated/     # Passed schema validation
│   ├── failed/        # Failed validation
│   ├── fixed/         # Auto-fixed YAML
│   ├── manual-review/ # Needs human review
│   └── staging/       # Approved for deployment
└── batch-002/ ... batch-020/

SCRIPTS TO CREATE:
1. scripts/generate-with-gemini.js - Gemini API integration
2. scripts/auto-fix-yaml.js - Common YAML error fixer
3. scripts/validate-skill-quality.py - Content quality checker
4. scripts/deploy-skills.js - Production deployment
5. scripts/generate-skills-index.js - SKILLS-INDEX.json builder

DELIVERABLES:
- Complete CI/CD pipeline (6 stages)
- All scripts working and tested
- Batch processing workflow documented
- Sample batch (5 skills) run through full pipeline
- Deployment dry-run successful

ACCEPTANCE:
- 5 test skills flow through all 6 stages
- Validation catches issues automatically
- Auto-fix resolves 80%+ of common errors
- Manual review queue < 20% of skills
- Deployment to workspace/gemini-testing/production/ works
- Ready for Phase 1 (real production run)

GATES:
- Gate 1: Schema validation (automated)
- Gate 2: Quality validation (AI-assisted)
- Gate 3: Human spot-check (10% sample)
- Gate 4: Deployment dry-run (safety check)

DOCUMENTATION:
- workspace/gemini-testing/PIPELINE.md
- workspace/gemini-testing/scripts/README.md
